Changelog
=========

---

  * Updated .pot file [blambert555]
  * Included updated Spanish translations [blambert555]
  * Included updated Brazilian Porteguese translations [blambert555]

---

  * Changes to work with Plone 4 [blambert555]

2.2
---

  * Updated for Plone 4
  * Fixed version numbers and GS handler

2.1.3
----------------

  * Modified JQuery variable to mitigate namespace conflicts
  * edited icon url paths

2.1.2
----------------

  * Added z-index to toggledBookmarks to ensure list has visibility priority

2.1.1
----------------

  * Updated JS show/hide function to JQuery call
  * Added Twitter to bookmarks
